name: elasticsearch
description: The official low-level Elasticsearch client for Node.js and the browser.

1.0.0.name: elasticsearch
1.0.0.description: The official low-level Elasticsearch client for Node.js and the browser.

scripts.coverage: mocha test/unit/test_*.js --require blanket -R html-cov > coverage.html && open -a "Google Chrome" ./coverage.html

1.0.1.name: elasticsearch
1.0.1.description: The official low-level Elasticsearch client for Node.js and the browser.

scripts.coverage: mocha test/unit/test_*.js --require blanket -R html-cov > coverage.html && open -a "Google Chrome" ./coverage.html

0.2.0.name: elasticsearch

0.3.1.name: elasticsearch
0.3.1.description: API around the ElasticSearch RESTful API -- mostly convenience.

scripts.coverage: rm -rf ./reports ; mkdir -p ./reports ; NODE_ELASTICSEARCH_COVERAGE=true mocha -R html-cov -r ./test/common.js -u bdd ./test/lib > reports/coverage.html
